arts.sum: Two Bundesliga players off to fantastic starts this season are scheduled for further examinations after incurring injuries in their respective Saturday 15:30 fixtures.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Bochum preview: Visitors looking to get off the mark
arts.sum: Bochum will attempt to claim their first points of the Bundesliga season when they travel to the Europa-Park Stadion for Saturday's encounter.

arts.ttl: Zeidler declares Miyoshi ready forminutes against Freiburg
arts.sum: Speaking at his Friday presser, VfL Bochum trainer Peter Zeidler noted that new summer addition Koji Miyoshi would factor in against Freiburg this weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
